issue.title: [C++][Fuzzing] IPC reads do not check buffer indices
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6270](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6270). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The attached crash was found by `arrow-ipc-fuzzing-test` and indicates that the IPC reader is not checking the flatbuffer encoded buffers for length and can produce out-of-bounds-reads.
